content.title: The Meeting House - Oakville
content.description: Our Oakville site is pretty great. Learn more about our location, people, Home Churches, events, and more.

image1.alt: Three friends hanging out and walking together in the city.
Three friends standing together and chatting at a street corner in the city.
A woman smiling, sitting at a table, and looking at Home Church notes, while two other friends who are also with her at the table talk and ask questions.
A large group of people hanging out together in an open concept living room for Home Church.

content.text5a: Includes full program for Infants to Grade 8
content.text6a: 7:00pm | Wednesdays | Youth Midweek for Grades 6 to 12

content.text1: These are the folks that help make community, discipleship, and Sunday mornings happen.

We want to lean into community and create a more local virtual experience that feels like family. On April 2, click the link below to participate. In the meantime, use the link if you have any questions for our lead pastor.

list.title: Connect
list.description: A link to open a service client and send an email to the pastor.

content.text1: We work together to create a safe community where our kids and youth can learn to love and follow Jesus. We do this through building relationships, equipping parents, and developing our own curriculum.

image1.alt: A young child playing with blocks.

content.text1: Our care ministries provide safe environments where people can receive the spiritual care they need in safe and intentional community, with trained and caring facilitators.

image1.alt: Two women sitting down together and talking as friends.
Several groups of people chatting in a living room.
Three people talking over an open bible at Home Church.
Three men sitting on a couch and talking.

content.text1: Something really good happens when we gather in our neighbourhoods to share life, grow deeper spiritual friendships, and talk about how we can live Jesus-centred lives, all while we invite others to join us.
We want to use our money, time, and resources to love and serve people on the margins.

image1.alt: Friends hanging out together and playing music at a campfire.
A young woman is talking to her friends in the church lobby.

content.text2: No need to take big leaps. Drop your email below and we'll send you some of our favourite content and suggest some small next steps you can take.
